overview_of_class: This course provides an overview of journalism fundamentals and will explore how news is defined, reported, written and produced for print, broadcast and online media platforms. Journalism 101 is designed to not only introduce students to journalism, but is tailored to help students begin to develop their own skills in producing content across a variety of platforms for news, sports, business and current affairs.
name: Introduction to Journalism
title: DOHA JOUR 101-0-70 Introduction to Journalism
